title: Live updates: Biden announces Ketanji Brown Jackson as historic nominee to the Supreme Court
description: Biden has chosen a Black woman for the Supreme Court for the first time in US history. If confirmed, she would be the sixth woman to serve on court.
content: WASHINGTON – President Joe Biden will formally announce U.S. Circuit Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson as his choice for a seat on the Supreme Court at the White House on Friday, marking the first time in … [+5907 chars]
